Key Match Events: Rohit retires hurt on 52 with shoulder injury
India's fast bowlers dominate on two-paced pitch
Number of Ireland batters hit by deliveries which rear up
India won an important toss and Rohit Sharma didn't hesitate in bowling first
Suryakumar Yadav gets out to George Dockrell
Rishabh Pant wins the game with a six off Ben White
Pre-Game Insights: India captain Rohit Sharma: 'We're unsure of what to expect from the pitch. It was all about getting used to the conditions'
Ireland captain Paul Stirling: 'The toss played a really important part in overcast conditions and then the pitch offered all sorts'
India will be hoping that Rohit Sharma's shoulder injury isn't too serious
Post-Match Reflections: India's fast bowlers dominated on a two-paced pitch
Ireland would have settled for a good display in defeat but that poor batting display will do little for their confidence going into the rest of the tournament
Paul Stirling: 'We were not quite up to that challenge and India bowled really well to put us under pressure'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rohit Sharma retires hurt with a shoulder injury
India won the toss and elected to bowl first
Suryakumar Yadav gets out to George Dockrell
